user_question: How can I improve my public speaking skills and generate an image of a confident speaker on stage?
final_answer: To improve public speaking skills: 1) Practice regularly. 2) Record and review your speeches. 3) Join a speaking club like Toastmasters. 4) Get feedback from peers. 5) Focus on storytelling. Image of a confident speaker on stage generated. Recommended books: 'Talk Like TED' by Carmine Gallo, 'The Art of Public Speaking' by Dale Carnegie, 'Confessions of a Public Speaker' by Scott Berkun.
